steps.name: Given I have created the CustomResourceDefinitions testresources.test.org and mycrds.test.org
And I have only configured testresources.test.org as a known CustomResourceDefinitionOfInterest
And the serviceaccount used to connect to Kubernetes does not have 'list' permissions on CustomResourceDefinitions

labels.name: feature
labels.value: As a controller-coordinator developer, I would like to perform common operations against Kubernetes using a simple interface to reduce the learning curve
